item.description:
Creating Sakuryo’s Kanji SRS

Sakuryo has a color scheme and a new navigation bar on the Left side as well as SRS based Kanji study.

item.title: A Simple Centralized SRS
item.description:
Creating Sakuryo’s SRS

Sakuryo now has the beginnings of a Anki compatible SRS that can take words directly from the dictionary and store them with your user data. The data is 100% exportable to Anki for offline study, I just have to get the formatting nice before I create that feature
